always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

msg.content: Please create a 3-day travel plan for two people, starting from Milwaukee and heading to New York. We are planning to visit from March 24th to March 26th, 2022. We have a budget of $1,900 and prefer to have non-shared rooms for our accommodations.

Please create a 3-day travel plan for two people, starting from Milwaukee and heading to New York. We are planning to visit from March 24th to March 26th, 2022. We have a budget of $1,900 and prefer to have non-shared rooms for our accommodations.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "I need to find out the best flight between Milwaukee and New York on March 24, 2022 returning on March 26, 2022. The budget for the flights is $1,900. Please make sure you provide the departure and arrival times as well as the flight number. Please provide the time to get from the airport to the accommodation after landing. Please give me a list of things to do in New York and places to eat for each day. We want to visit at least one museum and one art gallery but do not want to go to any club nights. We do not want to go to any restaurants which serve only meat. Please make sure you provide opening times and addresses of the places you suggest and the price range of meals. For the accommodation please ensure it is in a safe neighbourhood and has a non-shared room. The accommodation should not cost more than $1,000 for the three nights."}

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "I need to find out the best flight between Milwaukee and New York on March 24, 2022 returning on March 26, 2022. The budget for the flights is $1,900. Please make sure you provide the departure and arrival times as well as the flight number. Please provide the time to get from the airport to the accommodation after landing. Please give me a list of things to do in New York and places to eat for each day. We want to visit at least one museum and one art gallery but do not want to go to any club nights. We do not want to go to any restaurants which serve only meat. Please make sure you provide opening times and addresses of the places you suggest and the price range of meals. For the accommodation please ensure it is in a safe neighbourhood and has a non-shared room. The accommodation should not cost more than $1,000 for the three nights."}

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

msg.content: I need to find out the best flight between Milwaukee and New York on March 24, 2022 returning on March 26, 2022. The budget for the flights is $1,900. Please make sure you provide the departure and arrival times as well as the flight number. Please provide the time to get from the airport to the accommodation after landing. Please give me a list of things to do in New York and places to eat for each day. We want to visit at least one museum and one art gallery but do not want to go to any club nights. We do not want to go to any restaurants which serve only meat. Please make sure you provide opening times and addresses of the places you suggest and the price range of meals. For the accommodation please ensure it is in a safe neighbourhood and has a non-shared room. The accommodation should not cost more than $1,000 for the three nights.

msg.content:
# Flights

msg.name: delegate

msg.content:
Here is your 3-day travel itinerary for New York:

## Day 1 – 24 March 2022
10:50 – Depart Milwaukee on flight F3649645, arriving in New York at 14:22.

Once you have landed, it will take around 40 minutes to reach your accommodation by car, depending on traffic.

**Accommodation:**
I have found a few options for accommodation that fit your requirements:
- A private room in Harlem/Hamilton Heights at $398 for three nights.
- A rowhouse and garden in Williamsburg for $189 for three nights.
- A private apartment on E 44th Street at $297 for three nights.

**Evening:**
After checking in, you could visit the Empire State Building (20 W 34th St) and take in the views of the city from the observation deck. There's no opening time provided, so you can visit whenever suits you best.

For dinner, you could try Seasons 52 Fresh Grill, a restaurant with an average meal cost of $30. Unfortunately, I could not find the opening times or address for this restaurant.

## Day 2 – 25 March 2022
**Morning:**
Start your day at the 9/11 Memorial & Museum (180 Greenwich St) to pay your respects and learn about the 9/11 attacks and their aftermath.

**Afternoon:**
Visit the Statue of Liberty (New York, NY 10004) and take a ferry ride to Liberty Island for a closer look.

**Evening:**
Head to the Museum of Ice Cream (558 Broadway) for a unique art experience and some sweet treats. Like the other attractions, there are no opening times provided.

For dinner, Gurgaon Hights offers a variety of vegetarian and vegan dishes with an average cost of $46 per person. Again, I could not find the opening times or address for this restaurant.

## Day 3 – 26 March 2022
**Morning:**
Begin your last day in New York at Top of the Rock (30 Rockefeller Plaza), another fantastic observation deck with breathtaking views.

**Lunch:**
Try Golooji's Chat Waat, a popular restaurant serving Indian street food with an average meal cost of $53.

**Afternoon:**
Take a stroll in Central Park and enjoy the greenery and various attractions within the park.

**Evening:**
Depart for the airport to catch your return flight.

**Return Flight:**
Flight F3644990 departs New York at 15:20 and arrives in Milwaukee at 16:27.

Total estimated cost for flights: $398 per person.

Please note that I was unable to provide the exact opening times and addresses for the suggested restaurants due to unavailable information. However, I can assist with further research and updates if you wish to finalise your plans. Enjoy your trip to New York!
